HotelElement.Name: Tulip Inn Alp Style Dachau Munich Hotel

Address.Address1: Arcus Dauchau Hoptelbetriebs GmbH & co KG,

Description.Text: Situated in the historical Bavarian town of Dachau, on the outskirts of Munich, the modern Tulip Inn Alp Style Dachau Munich hotel offers guests a peaceful retreat, warm hospitality and all mod cons. It features 120 guestrooms, all decorated and furnished to reflect traditional Alpine style and incorporating natural materials and warm wood. The rooms come with a private bathroom, air conditioning, satellite TV, and free Wi-Fi. The hotel`s on-site restaurant is open throughout the day and offers a full buffet breakfast followed by a menu of traditional Bavarian dishes and snacks served at both lunch and dinner. Other benefits for guests include a fitness area, 24-hour reception, free parking and flexible conference space for meetings and events.
